definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Whole-genome sequencing is still an expensive, specialized activity.
sentences.chinese: 全程基因排序仍是各高成本，专业化的活动。

sentences.english: To trust my inner knowingness and take action accordingly… in personal and professional actions.
sentences.chinese: 信任内在的觉知，要身体力行，并且是专业化的行动。

sentences.english: But specialisation has its advantages as well.
sentences.chinese: 但是专业化也有其优势。

sentences.english: Therefore, it raised some proposals for the professionalized development of Shanghai special P. E. teachers.
sentences.chinese: 据此提出上海市特殊体育教师专业化发展建议。

sentences.english: Cultivating Educational Post Graduate is an important method for realising the specialization of teaching occupation.
sentences.chinese: 培养教育硕士是实现我国教师职业专业化的重要举措。

sentences.english: Will the Software Craftsmanship movement have a significant impact on the issue of professionalism?
sentences.chinese: 软件匠艺运动会对专业化的问题产生显著影响吗？

sentences.english: Qingdao Nouanz Packaging Machinery Manufacture Co. , Ltd. is a specialized American-owned company.
sentences.chinese: 是美商在华独资生产包装机械的专业化企业。

sentences.english: The BLOG technology is one kind of non-specialized KM technology.
sentences.chinese: 博客技术是一种新兴的非专业化知识管理技术。

sentences.english: Carton machinery spare parts manufacturing professional printing market.
sentences.chinese: 纸箱机械零部件生产专业化印刷市场。

sentences.english: Our company is specialized in sheet metal processing production base.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是专业化的钣金加工生产基地。

sentences.english: The degree of specialization is open to a group army .
sentences.chinese: 金地是专业化程度极强的一支集团军。

sentences.english: Specialization and routinization have reduced the creative aspects of their work.
sentences.chinese: 专业化和常规化已经减少了他们在工作上的创新局面。

sentences.english: Attorney the profession development is rapid, presents the collectivization and the specialized tendency and so on.
sentences.chinese: 律师行业发展迅速，呈现出集团化与专业化趋势等。

sentences.english: SMR is the most professional competitive intelligence service provider in the local China.
sentences.chinese: 赛立信是中国本土专业化程度最高的竞争情报服务商。

sentences.english: How did the concept of professionalism become so dominant?
sentences.chinese: 专业化是怎么占据了如此统治性的地位？

sentences.english: Educational curriculum of teachers is an important guarantee for the professionalization of teachers.
sentences.chinese: 教师教育课程是教师专业化的重要保证。

definition: socialization/to socialize/to fit into society/to train sb for society
informatization (the Information Age analog of industrialization)
to facilitate/expedite/make convenient and fast/speed up
